title: Facebook tried to punt the Trump decision. That backfired
Nick Kamen, iconic Levi's model and Madonna protégé, dead at 59
description: Nick Kamen, the British model and singer who appeared in a famous 1985 Levi's commercial, has died at the age of 59.

title: How Amy Coney Barrett has changed the Supreme Court in ways Kavanaugh hasn't
description: Supreme Court Justice Amy Coney Barrett has aligned most often with Clarence Thomas and Neil Gorsuch in her first months on the bench. Yet as the court enters the final weeks of its annual session, Barrett is also separating herself from brethren on the right with a lower key, attention-deflecting manner.

title: Colombia's bloody protests could be a warning to the region
description: Tensions have hardly dissipated in Colombia after President Ivan Duque withdrew a controversial fiscal reform proposal this weekend. Six days of protests had seen at least 19 people killed and hundreds injured. Now, the demonstrations have evolved into a broader popular show of anger.

title: China can't stop talking about the Bill and Melinda Gates divorce
Peloton recalls all treadmills after a child's death and 70 injuries
description: Peloton recalled its Tread+ and Tread treadmills Wednesday, and the company admitted it was wrong to fight the Consumer Product Safety Commission's request that it do so.

title: You can now drink beer made by Queen Elizabeth II -- or, at least, her estate
description: The UK's Queen Elizabeth II is associated with many things -- but beer is not usually among them.

title: Artist trades paintbrush for assault rifle
description: A former Israeli army sniper is using pistols, assault rifles and even a tank to create abstract art pieces.

title: We're starting to see how the pandemic affected births in the US
description: Remember that pandemic baby boom some thought we'd see about nine months after coronavirus lockdowns swept across the US?

title: The oldest human burial in Africa was a toddler laid to rest with a pillow
description: A toddler laid to rest with their head on a pillow in a cave in eastern Kenya is thought to be the oldest human burial ever found in Africa.

title: IPL: Australian cricketers scramble to leave India amid Covid-19 crisis
description: Australian and other overseas cricketers who have been participating in the Indian Premier League (IPL) are scrambling for ways to leave India as it faces the world's worst Covid-19 outbreak.

title: A shortage of these metals could make the climate crisis worse
description: The world won't be able to tackle the climate crisis unless there is a sharp increase in the supply of metals required to produce electric cars, solar panels, wind turbines and other clean energy technologies, according to the International Energy Agency.

title: Kim Kardashian West denies purchasing 'looted' ancient Roman statue
description: Reality star Kim Kardashian West has been named in court filings alleging she was involved in importing an ancient Roman statue that US officials say was stolen from Italy.

title: Aldi and other big grocers threaten to boycott Brazil over deforestation in the Amazon
description: Some of Europe's biggest supermarkets and food companies have threatened to stop buying agricultural products from Brazil if a bill they say would encourage deforestation in the Amazon becomes law.

title: A bottle of Bordeaux aged in space is expected to sell for $1 million
description: A bottle of Bordeaux wine that was aged for 14 months on the International Space Station (ISS) is up for sale -- and it could fetch $1 million.

title: The world sent India millions in Covid aid. Where has it gone?
Woman gives birth to nine babies -- two more than expected
description: A woman from Mali has given birth to nine babies -- two more than the seven that ultrasounds had detected -- according to the country's Ministry of Health.

title: Cinco de Mayo: These are, we kid you not, actual questions people ask Google about the holiday
description: When it comes to Cinco de Mayo -- the annual fiesta that gives Americans an excuse to load up on more tacos and margaritas than they usually do -- people ask a lot of questions.

title: Manchester City cracks code to reach first Champions League final
description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola praised the club's "incredible" journey after it reached the Champions League final for the first time.

title: Japanese town spent Covid-19 relief funds on building a statue of a giant squid
description: A coastal town in western Japan has drawn ire on social media for using some of the coronavirus relief funds it was given by the government to build a statue of a giant squid in the hopes of boosting tourism.

title: Teacher suspended after angry rant filmed by student
description: A New Jersey teacher is suspended after an angry rant against George Floyd and Black Lives Matter is recorded on a student's phone. CNN's Alexandra Field has reports.

title: Janet Yellen just proved markets can't handle the truth
description: When Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen speaks, investors listen. And on Tuesday, they didn't like what they heard.

title: Italy charged two Californians with murder. Here are the case details
description: The trial of the two US citizens charged with the murder of Italian police officer Mario Cerciello in July 2019 has concluded and a verdict is expected soon. CNN's Barbie Nadeau reports.

title: Real Madrid goalkeeper in 'happy place' ahead of Champions League clash with old club
description: He was once the darling of Chelsea fans, but now, Thibaut Courtois is hoping to bring nothing but frustration to his former club.

title: The man on a remote island keeping Napoleon's flame alive
description: In the middle of the Atlantic Ocean, between South America and Africa, lies the island of St Helena.

title: Katherine Schwarzenegger says Chris Pratt is a 'super-supportive' husband
description: When it comes to navigating motherhood, Katherine Schwarzenegger says her husband, Chris Pratt, is her biggest cheerleader.

title: What to know about the political drama raising fears over El Salvador's democracy
description: The future of El Salvador's democracy is under global scrutiny after lawmakers teamed up with populist president Nayib Bukele over the weekend to replace every judge on the Constitutional Court, the highest branch of the country's judiciary system.

title: From trial balloon to TV ratings hit, WNBA marks 25 years
description: By age 22, Rebecca Lobo had picked up a national college basketball championship, numerous player-of-the-year awards and Olympic gold at the 1996 Atlanta Games.

title: Planeloads of ventilators and oxygen supplies arrived last week but never made it out of airport hangars
description: As India's Covid-19 crisis tipped past breaking point last month, dozens of countries pledged critical aid.

title: Senior Swiss diplomat in Iran found dead after fall from high-rise building
description: The first secretary at the Swiss embassy in Tehran was found dead on Tuesday after falling from a high-rise building where she lived in the north of the city, a spokesman for emergency services was quoted as saying by Iranian news agencies.

title: Gadhafi's private jet is back on the move in southern France
description: The images that came out of Tripoli International Airport in August 2011 have become defining symbols of the downfall of the regime of Moammar Gadhafi, the autocrat who ruled Libya with an iron fist for over four decades.

title: Baby elephant rescued after falling into village well 30 feet deep
description: A baby elephant's misadventure turned into an elaborate rescue mission in a small Indian village after it fell into a well nearly 30 feet (9 meters) deep.

title: Why you might not really need 8 glasses of water per day
description: The warmer weather and longer days have inspired reminders to "stay hydrated" and drink eight glasses of water -- or about two liters -- a day.

title: These cows are getting a cello concert. Here's why
description: Students from the Scandinavian Cello School in Denmark found a unique way to give a concert during the Covid-19 pandemic by performing for cows.

title: Opinion: If India is overcome by Covid, consequences for rest of the world will be devastating
description:
• What's really happening in India's outbreak
• Companies scramble to protect their workers from India's Covid surge

title: Why these doctors traded their jobs for weapons
description: A dozen armed recruits crawl along a dusty pathway, the cicadas masking any sound of their approach towards their target, a small village in the jungles of Myanmar.

title: Teenager stabs 5 dead, including 3 kids, in Brazil daycare center attack
description: A teenager broke into a daycare center in southern Brazil and stabbed three children and two workers to death Tuesday before being overpowered by police, officials said.

title: Cindy McCain on Republican Party: I believe the pendulum will swing back
description: Cindy McCain, widow of longtime Republican Sen. John McCain of Arizona, weighs in on the current state of GOP and looks back on her late husband's relationship with Joe Biden.

title: Why are Australian officials hinting at war with China?
description: For a country with a much smaller military and no nuclear weapons, Australia is suddenly hinting an awful lot about a war with China.

title: Stranger attacks two Asian women with hammer in New York
description: Police are investigating after a stranger attacked two Asian women with a hammer in New York leaving one with a deep cut on her head.

title: France threatens to cut electricity to British island in post-Brexit fisheries dispute
description: France is "ready" to cut electricity to the British island of Jersey -- just off the French coast -- should the United Kingdom not abide by clauses of the Brexit agreement regarding fisheries, French Maritime Minister Annick Girardin said Tuesday.

title: Former TV star releases hilarious music video promoting vaccine
description: Talk about catchy...catch this Covid-19 vaccine PSA that will stick in your brain. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.

title: CNN speaks to House GOP leader's constituents. Here's what they think of him
description: CNN's Gary Tuchman speaks to constituents of House GOP leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy's district in Bakersfield, California, about what they think of their lawmaker.

title: Aerial photos reveal hidden beauty of airports
description: For many travelers, empty runways and lines of grounded planes represent the frustrations of the past year. For aerial photographer Tom Hegen, however, the disruption caused to the world's airports by Covid-19 offered a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
